title: An Ethics Watchdog Criticized Stacey Abrams. His Boss Retracted It.
description: A lawsuit over voting rights in Georgia prompted a debate over multimillion-dollar legal fees and conflicts of interest.
dc:creator: Michael Powell
media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
